description:
Ever encountered ‘NoSuchMethodError’ or ‘ClassNotFoundError’?

In Outbrain we moved from having those errors on a daily basis to barely encountering them.

With dozens of repositories, shared internal libraries and 3rd party libraries, dependency management quickly becomes a nightmare.

We mitigated our dependency management issues using a combination of build time enforcement, centralized dependency management and cross repo refactoring tools.

In this talk we’ll go through the problems we faced and explore the tools and concepts we adopted in order to reduce the dependency hell issues.

Come and see how we managed to substantially reduce our dependency hell issues.
title: Escaping Hell, How we tamed our 3rd party libraries.
